import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-crear-cliente', templateUrl: './crear-cliente.component.html', styleUrls: ['./crear-cliente.component.css'] }) export class CrearClienteComponent { foods: any[] = [ {value: 'steak-0', viewValue: 'Steak'}, {value: 'pizza-1', viewValue: 'Pizza'}, {value: 'tacos-2', viewValue: 'Tacos'}, ]; }
Crear Cliente
